snippet: Ballot measures that seek to slow California's campaign contribution race do not have to come in pairs; it just seems that way.    In 1988, voters grappled with dueling contribution-limit proposals, approved both of them and then watched as the co...
lead_paragraph: Ballot measures that seek to slow California's campaign contribution race do not have to come in pairs; it just seems that way. In 1988, voters grappled with dueling contribution-limit proposals, approved both of them and then watched as the courts blocked most of what they enacted.
abstract: Voters in California will decide two more ballot proposals to slow the campaign contribution race (S)

headline.main: Again, a Ballot Duel on Campaign Finance
